coreAttributes.name: Leaf Stone
coreAttributes.description: A mysterious green stone from another world. Apparently it has the power to evolve certain creatures
coreAttributes.applyEffects: #IF(!npc.isPlayer() && npc.isUnique() && (!npc.isSlave() || npc.getOwner().isPlayer())) [style.italicsDisabled(This item does not work on non-slave unique characters...)] #ELSEIF(npc.getSubspecies()==SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Eevee) [##game.getCharacterUtils().reassignBody(npc, npc.getBody(), npc.getGender(), SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Leafeon, RACE_STAGE_GREATER, true)] [style.italics([npc.Name] evolved into [npc.a_race]!)] #ELSE Nothing seems to happen... #ENDIF
